appName.message: Censor Tracker – Proxy for Privacy & Security

appDesc.message: A censorship circumvention extension. Stay safe online with our proxy extension.

disseminatorTitle.message: May transmit your data to government authorities.

notDisseminatorTitle.message: Information about data transmission was not found.

notDisseminatorDesc.message: Some websites may transmit your personal data to government authorities, but we have no such information about this website.

disseminatorDesc.message: This service may transfer your personal data (including messages and all traffic) to government authorities.

disseminatorCoopRefused.message: This service claimed that they do not transmit personal data to third parties.

blockedDesc.message: Access to the website is blocked, but Censor Tracker provides you access to it through a reliable proxy.

notBlockedDesc.message: If access to the website is blocked, Censor Tracker will offer to load it through a reliable proxy.

controlledByOtherExtensionsMessage.message: Another extension controls the proxy. More details →

privateBrowsingPermissionsRequiredMessag.message: Proxy disabled. Private Window browsing permissions required →

ignoredSitesDesc.message: Hosts that will always be ignored by Censor Tracker. If there are problems with opening the website, this list may help. Each host starts with a new line.

autosaveTip.message: Changes will be automatically applied upon pressing <kbd>Enter</kbd> or <kbd>Control</kbd> + <kbd>S</kbd>.

optionsProxyDesc.message: If a website is blocked, Censor Tracker will bypass restrictions to give you access to it. Disable this setting if you use another service to bypass censorship (for example, a VPN) to increase connection speed.

privateBrowsingRequired.message: Allow the extension to work in private windows.

privateBrowsingRequiredDesc.message: So that we can open blocked websites for you through our proxy. There is no another way to make proxy work in Firefox.

optionsIgnoredWebsitesDesc.message: Addresses for which proxy will always be disabled. If there are problems with opening certain websites, this list may help.

showNotificationsDesc.message: We will warn you when you visit a service that transmits your messages, personal data, and all traffic to third parties automatically.

shareFeedback.message: Got issues or suggestions? Let us know!

useProxyDesc.message: If a website is blocked, Censor Tracker will bypass restrictions to give you access to it. Disable this setting if you use another service to bypass censorship (for example, a VPN) to increase connection speed.

controlledByOtherExtensionTitle.message:
Another extension «
$name$
» is controlling your proxy settings.

controlledByOtherExtensionDesc.message:
To use Censor Tracker, disable «
$name$
» in browser settings.

controlledByOtherExtensions.message: Other extensions are controlling your proxy.

controlledByOtherExtensionsDesc.message: To use Censor Tracker, disable the following extensions in browser settings:

extensionInstalledDesc.message: Pin the Censor Tracker in the browser panel in two clicks to always be aware of websites that may transmit your personal data to third parties.

cooperationAcceptedMessage.message: $hostname$ may share your data with third parties.

trafficShapingDescription.message: Traffic shaping detected: connection to this website is throttled. Censor Tracker gives you access to it at a normal speed.

installedAllowIncognitoTitle.message: Allow Censor Tracker to work in Private Mode.

installedAllowIncognitoDescription.message: This permission is required for Censor Tracker to open blocked websites for you through a proxy. In Firefox, there is no other way.

installedAllowIncognitoDescriptionThen.message: After that, open the Censor Tracker's popup and confirm the permissions are granted.

incognitoAccessRequiredTitle.message: The website is unavailable or blocked. Allow Censor Tracker incognito access to open such websites.

incognitoAccessRequiredDescription.message: To open $hostname$ through a proxy in Firefox, you need permission to work in Private Windows. Otherwise, our proxy will not work.

advancedOptionsDesc.message: You can manually update the local database of blocked websites, update the config of Censor Tracker and manage other advanced options.

optionsConfirmResetMessage.message: All your settings will be removed. Are you sure you want to do this?

proxiedWebsitesEditorPageDesc.message: You can manually add domains that will be proxied by the extension.

optionsProxiedWebsitesEditorDesc.message: You can manually manage the list of domains that will be proxied by the extension.

updateLocalRegistryTitle.message: Force update the extension's local database.

updateLocalRegistryDesc.message: Update the local database of the blocked websites for your region.

resetToDefaultDesc.message: Reset all the settings to default and generate PAC file for your current region. This option is your choice if there are blocked websites availability problems.

areYouSureYouWantToResetSettingsTitle.message: Are you sure you want to reset all settings?

areYouSureYouWantToResetSettingsDesc.message: Regenerate the PAC file for your current region and reset the settings.

updateTakesTime.message: Database update will take some time.

proxyOptionsStatusTitle.message: The proxy is working intermittently right now.

proxyOptionsStatusDesc.message: You can disable proxying or switch to your own proxy.

debugInfoTip.message: Click here to see debug information.

emergencyConfigDesc.message: Allows you to work even in conditions of complete blocking of all our IP addresses and hosts. Do not enable this mode unless there are availability issues.
